overview: I’m the co-funder of Okazjum.pl and the co-owner of BookLikes where he works as IT Manager. I’ve graduated from Poznan University of Technology and totally immersed in software space, programming and database building are his hobbyhorse. I’m also the SEO and ERP applications specialist. I developed and improved my IT skills supervising complex webpages building processes and software engineering projects. I love to create new programming solutions to adjust webpages to their users expectations and needs. Currently I’m BookLikes’s leading softaware architect, new algorithm inventor and gifted computer scientist.
